12.content:
You watched as an enormous Kagura came into view. The sorceress stood as large as a mountain in front of you.

Kagura took a massive step forward her huge foot filling all of your view. You ran as fast as your tiny legs could go as her giant foot landed barely missing you. Kagura didn't notice you and took another step as another huge foot moved forward this time you weren't able to move in time. Kagura's giant foot landed on you but lucky you were able to escape death by moving in between her toes. You're wedged between her toes and instantly assaulted with a horrible foot odor. Considering she never wore sandals or anything on her feet it's to be expected that her feet would be very dirty. As you wiggled the huge wind-witch felt something squirm between her toes Kagura wondered if she stepped on a bug and it got stuck between her toes. Kagura bent over to inspect her toes she opened her toes on her foot looking for the source of her irritation. Her ruby eyes caught sight of you.

The next thing youknew, you were scooped on top of a giant index finger as you passed Kagura's foot from the air. Her toes passed by fallowed by the ball of her foot, her arches, her sole, and her heel. Soon you were infrount of her face.

"A bug." Kagura sighes "Nothing more, doomed to suffer it's existance with everything around it choosing if it lives or dies, unable to got anywere a feel truly free and safe..."

Grate, on top of nearly killing you, she's using you as a metaphor.You crawl across her finger and then the back of her hand, Kagura giggled.

"I may not be free of Narraku yet, but at least you can keep me company buggy. I'll be good for us both, I'll keep you safe and you'll be my companion from now on." she said smiling at you.

With that, Kagura put you...

choices: Stay silent and do your job.
1212.content:
"I want you to paint my nails, bug," Kagura commanded you as her big ruby-reddish eyes were staring down at your direction, "all 20 of them."

So she only met you like 30 seconds and already she's giving you orders like her little slave? You shoulda known you werent gonna have it easy with the major villainess of the series. Not like you could just easily tell her off... seeing as though you were at the mercy of her feet alone, let alone the rest of her body. Still, despite how terrified you were deep down, you kept yourself calm and prevented yourself from showing any sign of fear on your face.. You were a wall. A stone wall.

"Did you hear me, bug?" Kagura asked you, probably a little annoyed by your awkward silence.
You kept an unphazed look on your face and answered, "Yeah."
However, it seemed as though Kagura could read you like a book. You were not too small to sense a hint of hostility.

"Do you object?"
"Huh?"
"Do you object to your position as my new servant?" Kagura actually asked. It kinda took you by surprise. Someone like HER actually caring about what YOU want?
"If you dont wish to take such a role, feel free to say so," she actually told you, "By all means, speak your mind."
Well, that's awfully generous of her! You never thought somebody like her would say something like that!

"Ok. I dont-"
"Too bad."
*Craacccckk!!* "AAAAAARRRGGGHHH!!!!" you let out a howling scream, the moment she squeezed you in between her toes tightly! No bullshit. It hurt. A LOT. You might possibly be bleeding internally, but youre still alive!

"Not a bug's place to question it's master," Kagura warned you as she continued squeezing you, "if the bug still values it's life, it will do whatever it must possible in order to keep what little life it has left." Ouch. Consider that an 'IT DOESNT MATTER WHAT YOU THINK!' Youre pretty much screwed at this point. Kagura really is the cold vindictive bitch enslaved by an even colder and more vindictive bastard...

Finally after a while of silence, she finally lets you go. You immediately dropped to the ground, desperately trying to catch your breath.

"Face it, bug. I'm the only companion you've got," you could make out a cold grin across Kagura's face, "and as long as you wish to keep it that way, you'd better start learning your place. Just like me..." Tragic fate from such a tragic person. It seems like your fate's sealed.

"Here," just then she reached in her sleeve and pulled out a tiny little brush and set it down next to you, "you can start with my toenails since something of your stature is the closest to. And do not get my feet wait, or they'll be hell to pay!"

Urggh.... damnit. That's gonna take forever finishing out of feet, let alone both her feet AND hands! But what are YOU gonna do about it? What CAN you do about it?

"Do you object to your position?" Kagura asked you again, with yet another sly grin on her face. She could sense your unease and is gladly mocking you over it! "By all means, speak your mind.... Go ahead. If you have something to say... SAY IT!"
1212.title: Speak up! I dare ya!

12122.title: Speak your mind!

121221.content:
No matter how much you hate her, how badly you wanna escape, how desperate you wanna get back home, you were at her mercy. You are in incredible pain from just the squeezes between her toes. Another one of those and you'd be dead! For now, Kagura is your master.

"Y...yes..." you groaned as you gripped your nearly broken ribs in paind, "Yes...I do! Yes I do!"
The grin of Kagura's face disappeared and morphed into somewhat of a serious threatening glare. "Good," she set you back down next to her feet and that little toenail brush, "now suck it up and finish your job! Or a few measly broken ribs will be the LEAST of your worries."

You took a few deep breaths, trying to ignore your aching as you picked up the brush. Just stretching your arms enough to pick up the brush was a hell of a lot of hurting itself. You winced and moaned under your breath as you tried to fight back your tears. But you had no choice. Like Kagura taught you the hard way, the sooner you learn your place, the less painful it'll be for you. Mentally AND physically!

"Urgg... urghh..." sure enough the brush was pretty heavy for someone as tiny as you. And to make a perfect stroke down her toenails without so much as touching the rest of her feet was a challenge. Thankfully, the most time you spent through the hellish choir were on her big toes. The other toes werent as much trouble, but the pain in your ribs made it extremely frustration.

Even Kagura could see your struggling. "Hm," she put her hand to her mouth as her big reddish demonic eyes watched you like a hawk, "you seem to be struggling. Such a shame. If you had learned to be obedient sooner, you'd have been spared a painful lesson. Hopefully, that'll stick in your mind in the future, yes?"
"Y....yes ma'am," you groaned as you fought to keep your arms up as you finished up her last toe!

...FINALLY! The last toe was done. You immediately dropped your brush and started catching your breath. Sadly, you knew it wasnt over yet. You still had her FINGERNAILS to do! Fun, yes? But until then...
"I....I.... finished your toes.... ma'am," you blurted out in the middle of every inhale and exhale.

"Let's see how you did, shall we?" Kagura remarked as she looked over at her newly black painted toenails...
121221.title: Painful Lessons
